name: Stupendous Boring Life (Prototype)
description:
This Project is a prototype of a game I want to make, it's still have a long way to go, but I will get there, 26/March 2022.

* * * * * * * * * * * * * *

What is Stupendous Boring Life?

A RPG , dating sims, city builder game where you can:

  • Farm
  • Battle
  • Date NPCs
  • Develop your city
  • Try to survive
  • Be a hero
  • Conquer dungeons
  • Fish!
  • Be a treasure Hunter

* * * * * * * * * * * * * *

Some other time I will came back to this game.
